header.title: CosEventDomainAdmin

erlref.modulesummary: This module export functions which return QoS and Admin Properties constants.

description.p:
To get access to all definitions include necessary hrl files by using:
-include_lib("cosEventDomain/include/*.hrl").

func.name: 'CycleDetection'() -> string()
func.fsummary: Return the CycleDetection identifier required when defining QoS Properties

desc.p: This function returns the CycleDetection identifier; required when defining QoS Properties.

func.name: 'AuthorizeCycles'() -> short()
func.fsummary: Return the AuthorizeCycles value; required when defining QoS Properties

desc.p: This function returns the AuthorizeCycles value; required when defining QoS Properties.

func.name: 'ForbidCycles'() -> short()
func.fsummary: Return the ForbidCycles value; required when defining QoS Properties

desc.p: This function returns the ForbidCycles value; required when defining QoS Properties.

func.name: 'DiamondDetection'() -> string()
func.fsummary: Return the DiamondDetection identifier required when defining QoS Properties

desc.p: This function returns the DiamondDetection identifier; required when defining QoS Properties.

func.name: 'AuthorizeDiamonds'() -> short()
func.fsummary: Return the AuthorizeDiamonds value; required when defining QoS Properties

desc.p: This function returns the AuthorizeDiamonds value; required when defining QoS Properties.

func.name: 'ForbidDiamonds'() -> short()
func.fsummary: Return the ForbidDiamonds value; required when defining QoS Properties

desc.p: This function returns the ForbidDiamonds value; required when defining QoS Properties.
